oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Top reduced cross section behavior at the LHeC kinematic range
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Boroun, G. R.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: High Energy Physics - Phenomenology
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The linear and non-linear behavior of the top reduced cross section in the LHeC region is considered concerning the boson-gluon fusion (BGF) model at the deep inelastic scattering leptoproduction. We will show that the nonlinear behavior, at this region, for the $t\overline{t}$ production is very small. Also the behavior of the top reduced cross section and the ratio $R^{t}$ in this processes is considered.
